column4: is there anyone there who can help me with a couple of questions....or do I need to wait for a turn....thanks
recently installed ubuntu: wanting to change the boot default from ubuntu to windows....for my mom's sake....she is completely illiterate.
move the windows config in menu.lst to the top above the autogen stuff, so it's now default 0
